analysis.description:
Reentrancy in HieCrowdsale.initialAllocation (/unique_chucks/11/0xb7c7897275ec4119c50481bff7d8b487fdfff6a0.sol):
	External calls:
	- HieToken(token).mint(wallet,INITIAL_ALLOCATE_TOKEN) (/unique_chucks/11/0xb7c7897275ec4119c50481bff7d8b487fdfff6a0.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isInitialAllocated (/unique_chucks/11/0xb7c7897275ec4119c50481bff7d8b487fdfff6a0.sol)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0xb7c7897275ec4119c50481bff7d8b487fdfff6a0.sol#512-516) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xb7c7897275ec4119c50481bff7d8b487fdfff6a0.sol#516)

HieCrowdsale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/11/0xb7c7897275ec4119c50481bff7d8b487fdfff6a0.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-HieToken(token).mint(this,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xb7c7897275ec4119c50481bff7d8b487fdfff6a0.sol)

HieCrowdsale.initialAllocation (/unique_chucks/11/0xb7c7897275ec4119c50481bff7d8b487fdfff6a0.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-HieToken(token).mint(wallet,INITIAL_ALLOCATE_TOKEN) (/unique_chucks/11/0xb7c7897275ec4119c50481bff7d8b487fdfff6a0.sol)
